title: Dissolution
description: Librarian's note: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN B00DDHL9WU.He wanted her to leave him, but, in the end, he was forced to do it.Separating himself from Lila puts Nathan in a level of hell he never knew existed. The journey is a spiraling decent where the beast inside is released and havoc reigns in the arena of self-destruction.But what is he to do? It was for the best, after all.The last three chapters of Breach from Nathanâ€™s point of view.
author: K.I. Lynn
